inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| extend enableautomaticupdates_ = column_ifexists("enableautomaticupdates", 0)
| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "not_found")
| extend OfficeVersionBuild_ = column_ifexists("OfficeVersionBuild", "not_found")
| extend OfficeProductSKU_ = column_ifexists("OfficeProductSKU", "not_found")
| extend OfficeInstallationPath_ = column_ifexists("InstallationPath", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannel_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannel", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannelName_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannelName", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateEnabled_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateEnabled", "not_found")
| extend VersionToReport_ = column_ifexists("VersionToReport", "not_found")
| extend ProductReleaseIds_ = column_ifexists("ProductReleaseIds", "not_found")
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ProductReleaseIds_ contains "O365"
| where (OfficeUpdateEnabled_ == "False") or (enableautomaticupdates_ == 0) 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"UPDATING O365 OFFICE NOT ENABLED | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo1-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo1-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientOfficeInfoV2_CL
| extend enableautomaticupdates_ = column_ifexists("enableautomaticupdates", 0)
| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "not_found")
| extend OfficeVersionBuild_ = column_ifexists("OfficeVersionBuild", "not_found")
| extend OfficeProductSKU_ = column_ifexists("OfficeProductSKU", "not_found")
| extend OfficeInstallationPath_ = column_ifexists("InstallationPath", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannel_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannel", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateChannelName_ = column_ifexists("UpdateChannelName", "not_found")
| extend OfficeUpdateEnabled_ = column_ifexists("OfficeUpdateEnabled", "not_found")
| extend VersionToReport_ = column_ifexists("VersionToReport", "not_found")
| extend ProductReleaseIds_ = column_ifexists("ProductReleaseIds", "not_found")
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where ProductReleaseIds_ contains "O365"
| where (OfficeUpdateChannel_ notcontains "492350f6-3a01-4f97-b9c0-c7c6ddf67d60") and (OfficeUpdateChannel_ notcontains "55336b82-a18d-4dd6-b5f6-9e5095c314a6") // 492350f6-3a01-4f97-b9c0-c7c6ddf67d60 = Current channel, 55336b82-a18d-4dd6-b5f6-9e5095c314a6 = monthly enterprise channel
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT UPDATE CHANNEL O365 OFFICE | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo1-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo1-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

| extend OfficeDescription_ = column_ifexists("OfficeDescription", "not_found")
